channel.title: Events
channel.description: Learn more about what events Redapt is hosting in the tech space.

item.title: Data Modernization Workshop | February 3
item.description:
Microsoft Gold Partner Redapt is pleased to invite you to this upcoming Data Modernization Workshop on Wednesday, Feb. 3, from 8:00 a.m. to 12:00 p.m. PST.

Our Data Modernization Workshop is a hands-on virtual event for TDMs, DBAs and other data roles that focus on the value and process of migrating apps and databases to Azure.

In this workshop, you learn how to develop a plan for migrating on-premises VMs and SQL Server databases into a combination of IaaS and PaaS services in Azure. You perform assessments to reveal any feature parity and compatibility issues between the customer's SQL Server 2008 R2 databases and Azure's managed database offerings. You then design a solution for migrating their existing on-premises services, including VMs and databases, into Azure, with minimal down-time. Finally, you demonstrate some of the advanced SQL features available in Azure to improve security and performance in the customer's applications.

At the end of this workshop, you will be better able to design and implement a cloud migration solution for business-critical applications and databases.

Register now to secure your spot!
item.content:encoded:

item.author: redapt-marketing@testsite.redapt.com (Redapt Marketing)

item.title: .NET App Modernization Workshop | January 26
item.description:
Microsoft Gold Partner Redapt invites you to an interactive exploration of architecting a solution for modernizing legacy on-premises applications and infrastructure using cloud services.

In this FREE, half-day workshop, you gain a better understanding of the steps involved in modernizing .NET applications and legacy infrastructure by leveraging cloud services. You also see how applications can be enhanced by adding a mix of web and mobile services, all secured using Azure Active Directory.

In this workshop, you will learn how to:

  • Evaluate and prioritize .NET applications for modernization
  • Use Azure to help increase .NET application resiliency and scalability
  • Modernize existing applications with minimal interruptions
  • Utilize best practices and design patterns
  • Avoid common obstacles and map out your migration/modernization strategy

At the end of this workshop, your ability to design and implement a modernization plan for organizations looking to move services from on-premises to the cloud will be improved.

Please signup on the event page.

item.title: Redapt Webinar: Ensuring Governance & Security in the Age of Remote Working with Windows Virtual Desktop
item.description: Keep your data and applications secure even with your teams working remotely.

item.title: Redapt Webinar: Reach the Market at Light Speed with Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
item.description:
Kick your innovation and deployments into high gear by leveraging Azure Kubernetes Service in your development process.

Join Redapt DevOps Practice Lead, Jerry Meisner, for a 45-minute discussion on how you can utilize AKS to containerize your applications and gain the speed and flexibility of modern development.
item.content:encoded:
Kick your innovation and deployments into high gear by leveraging Azure Kubernetes Service in your development process.

Join Redapt DevOps Practice Lead, Jerry Meisner, for a 45-minute discussion on how you can utilize AKS to containerize your applications and gain the speed and flexibility of modern development.
item.author: redapt-marketing@testsite.redapt.com (Redapt Marketing)

item.title: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) Workshop | January 19
item.description:
Microsoft Gold Partner Redapt invites you to a deep-dive, interactive exploration of architecting and deploying a Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) infrastructure.

This Windows Virtual Desktop Workshop provides you with both the knowledge and skills to accelerate designing and implementing a virtual desktop infrastructure on Azure. The workshop covers deployment options, architecture best practices, management plane options, user profiles and data, along with third-party tools and licensing considerations.  

In the labs, you will create your first Windows Virtual Desktop architecture, create Active Directory groups, assign users, create a master image, and then connect to a virtual desktop. In the second lab, you will dig into operationalizing your virtual desktop infrastructure with monitoring, scaling and image management.

In this workshop, IT Pros (TDM, IT Implementer) will better understand:

  • Windows Virtual Desktop architecture best practices.
  • Pooled or single VM host choices.
  • Available Management Control planes.
  • Security considerations
  • Image management and scaling

Please signup on the event page.

item.author: redapt-marketing@testsite.redapt.com (Redapt Marketing)

item.title: Infrastructure Migration Workshop
item.description:
Microsoft Gold Partner, Redapt invites you to a deep-dive, interactive exploration of how to migrate existing infrastructure to the cloud. We’re hosting a one-day, virtual workshop covering everything from whiteboarding migration strategies to hands-on experiences with migration tools, and we’d like you to be a part of it!

In this workshop, professionals in infrastructure management and technical decision-making roles will better understand:

  • The reasoning and value of migrating VMs and servers to Azure
  • How to whiteboard a VM/Server migration strategy
  • Tools and methods available to help you migrate to Azure

The workshop will focus on infrastructure migration use cases, cloud TCO value, common obstacles to avoid, and mapping out your migration/modernization strategy. You will also get the hands-on training to help get you started on your cloud migration journey. Labs will focus on (1) creating your migration landing zone in Azure, and (2) migrating VMs and Servers to Azure.

Sign up today!

Sign up today!
item.author: redapt-marketing@testsite.redapt.com (Redapt Marketing)

item.title: Analytics in a Day Virtual Workshop
item.description:
As a Microsoft Gold Partner, Redapt is pleased to invite you to this upcoming Analytics in a Day virtual workshop, and we encourage you to explore our Azure capabilities and reach out with any questions. 

This half-day, virtual workshop and hands-on lab incorporates all the latest features of Azure Synapse Analytics that are currently in public preview. See how you can accelerate time to insight with the unified experience that brings data ingestion, enterprise data warehousing, and big data analytics into a single service.

In our workshop, data professionals will better understand how to:

  • Streamline cloud analytics pipelines
  • Build a scalable modern data warehouse
  • Ensure flexibility with business needs

The last 90 minutes of the workshop will be dedicated to hands-on training to help get you started on your cloud analytics journey. The lab will focus on building an end-to-end analytics solution with Azure Synapse and Power BI.

 

Please signup on the event page.

item.title: Data Modernization in a Day Virtual Workshop
item.description:
As a Microsoft Gold Partner, Redapt is pleased to invite you to this upcoming Data Modernization in a Day Workshop, and we encourage you to explore our Azure capabilities and reach out with any questions.

Data Modernization in a Day is a hands-on workshop for TDMs, DBAs and other data roles that focuses on the value and process of migrating apps and databases to Azure.

Presented by Redapt data experts, this workshop focuses on helping customers who have moved infrastructure but no applications or data to Azure. Data Modernization in a Day focuses on the value and process of migrating apps and databases to Azure utilizing SQL Database, SQL Infrastructure as-a-Service (IaaS) and other data modernization Azure services and techniques.

Register now to secure your spot!

item.description:

The Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) Workshop provides you with both the knowledge and skills to accelerate designing and implementing a virtual desktop infrastructure on Azure. The workshop covers deployment options, architecture best practices, management plane options, user profiles and data, along with third party tools and licensing considerations. 

In the labs you will create your first WVD architecture, create Active Directory groups, assign users, create a master image and then connect to a virtual desktop. In the second lab you will dig into operationalizing your virtual desktop infrastructure with monitoring, scaling and image management.

We look forward to connecting with you!

item.title: .NET App Modernization in a Day Virtual Workshop
item.description:
As a Microsoft Gold Partner, Redapt is pleased to invite you to this upcoming .NET App Modernization in a Day virtual workshop, and we encourage you to explore our Azure capabilities and reach out with any questions.

This 1-day workshop, presented by Redapt experts, helps customers looking to drive cost savings and efficiencies managing their .NET application estate. This workshop was built to help customers evaluate their applications, prepare them for migration and host them on managed tools in Azure that were purpose-built for .NET,  drive app migrations of .NET applications to Azure App Service and Azure SQL DB. It includes L100 presentation, whiteboard design session materials and hands-on lab. Content is based on Microsoft Cloud Workshops, that are widely used by Microsoft specialists and solution architects. 

In this workshop, customers will learn how to evaluate and prioritize .NET applications for modernization, How Microsoft technologies can help increase .NET application resiliency and allow them to scale easily, How to modernize existing applications with minimal interruptions, We will focus on best practices, design patterns and common obstacles to avoid, and mapping out your migration/modernization strategy.

We look forward to connecting with you!  

Please signup on the event page.
